input.sentences: these are my two best friends .
they come over for a housewarming party along with other friends .
everyone was feeling at home | and both said i did a fantastic job at decorating .
we sat down for a quick luch .
then we took some pictures to send yo everyone that could not make it that day !
output.sentences: Susan was so happy to see all of her friends.
She threw herself a house warming party and all her friends showed up.
Susan was feeling excited because her new job allowed her to work from home.
Everyone sat together and had a quick lunch.
Susan wanted to remember this day for ever so she hired a photographer to take pictures.
